nodes.text: It would be difficult to justify only addressing peanut allergies and ignore other conditions that threaten the health and well being of passengers.
traveller(382): It would be difficult to justify only addressing peanut allergies and ignore other conditions that threaten the health and well being of passengers.
Annot: It would be difficult to justify only addressing peanut allergies and ignore other conditions that threaten the health and well being of passengers.
The affected person should bear the responsibility to know their own condition and to properly prepare for managing it.
traveller(382): The affected person should bear the responsibility to know their own condition and to properly prepare for managing it.
Annot: The affected person should bear the responsibility to know their own condition and to properly prepare for managing it.
Airlines should be expected to accommodate special diet requests which are made with adequate prior notice.
traveller(382): Airlines should be expected to accommodate special diet requests which are made with adequate prior notice.
Annot: Airlines should be expected to accommodate special diet requests which are made with adequate prior notice.
In the case of passengers who are not able to manage their own situations, written disclosures to flight personnel should enable flight personnel to institute an appropriate response.
traveller(382): In the case of passengers who are not able to manage their own situations, written disclosures to flight personnel should enable flight personnel to institute an appropriate response.
Annot: In the case of passengers who are not able to manage their own situations, written disclosures to flight personnel should enable flight personnel to institute an appropriate response.
I've registered my son on a flight as peanutallergic and had the attendant try to hand him a bag of peanuts.
elizwestley(376): I've registered my son on a flight as peanutallergic and had the attendant try to hand him a bag of peanuts.
Annot: I've registered my son on a flight as peanutallergic and had the attendant try to hand him a bag of peanuts.
Flight personnel need more education on this.
elizwestley(376): Flight personnel need more education on this.
Annot: Flight personnel need more education on this.
